SEARCH
Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.specialized.strategies

Interface SolvingStrategyInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractARMSolvingStrategy, AbstractIMSolvingStrategy, AllARLiftSolvingStrategy, AllARSolvingStrategy, ClosedARSolvingStrategy, FCISolvingStrategy, FGSolvingStrategy, FISolvingStrategy, IGBSolvingStrategy, MFISolvingStrategy, MNRSolvingStrategy, MRISolvingStrategy, PerfectlySporadicARSolvingStrategy, PRISolvingStrategy, RCISolvingStrategy
public interface SolvingStrategyInterface
Solving strategies define the way different types of data mining and pattern finding algorithms are to be executed. Association Rule Mining (ARM), Frequent Itemset Mining (IM), etc. are certain types of data mining that concerns these strategies.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Solutions<? extends PatternInterface>
    solve(String filePath)
    Executes the strategy and finds the solution patterns.

  • Method Details

    • solve

      Solutions<? extends PatternInterface> solve(String filePath) throws IOException, InstantiationException
      Executes the strategy and finds the solution patterns.
      Parameters:
      filePath - path to the transactional database file.
      Returns:
      The solutions considering its strategy.
      Throws:
      IOException - All other problems whilst running the algorithm, etc.
      InstantiationException - Whether there is a problem when creating the runner used in the solving strategy.
      See Also:
      • Solutions
